ResearchProjectDef.label: Exotic Animal Prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to use and craft exotic animal prosthetics to replace such things as tentacles, wings, echolocation organs and so on

ResearchProjectDef.label: Exotic Animal Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to use and craft exotic bionics to create bionic tentacles, wings, echolocation organs, etc

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic tentacle
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic tentacle. Should be able to replace almost any tentacle.

ThingDef.label: bionic tentacle
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic tentacle for animals. Should be able to replace almost any tentacle.

ThingDef.label: bionic motion detector
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic motion detector for animals. This motion detector replaces echolocation organs and vibration sensors.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic buoyancy mechanism
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic buoyancy mechanism. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.

ThingDef.label: bionic buoyancy mechanism
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic buoyancy mechanism for animals. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic shell
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic shell. Should be able to replace carapaces and shells.

ThingDef.label: bionic shell
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic shell for animals. Should be able to replace carapaces and shells.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic wing
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic wing. Should be able to replace any type of wing.

ThingDef.label: bionic wing
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic wing for animals. Should be able to replace any type of wing.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic claw
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic claw. Fits animals with sharpened claws.

ThingDef.label: bionic claw
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic claw. Fits animals with sharpened claws.

ThingDef.label: goo acidifier
ThingDef.description: A goo acidifier increases the acidity of a goo's internal organs, making it explode as soon as it is downed. Basically transforms goos into biological suicide bombers.

HediffDef.label: bionic motion detector
HediffDef.description: Improved bionic motion detector for animals. This motion detector replaces echolocation organs and vibration sensors.

HediffDef.label: simple prosthetic buoyancy mechanism
HediffDef.description: Simple prosthetic buoyancy mechanism. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.

HediffDef.label: bionic buoyancy mechanism
HediffDef.description: Improved bionic buoyancy mechanism for animals. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.

HediffDef.label: simple prosthetic shell
HediffDef.description: Simple prosthetic shell. Should be able to replace carapaces and shells.

HediffDef.label: bionic shell
HediffDef.description: Improved bionic shell for animals. Should be able to replace carapaces and shells.

HediffDef.label: simple prosthetic wing
HediffDef.description: Simple prosthetic wing. Should be able to replace any type of wing.

HediffDef.label: bionic wing
HediffDef.description: Improved bionic wing for animals. Should be able to replace any type of wing.

HediffDef.label: simple prosthetic claw
HediffDef.description: Simple prosthetic claw. Fits animals with sharpened claws.

HediffDef.label: bionic claw
HediffDef.description: Improved bionic claw. Fits animals with sharpened claws.

HediffDef.label: goo acidifier
HediffDef.description: A goo acidifier increases the acidity of a goo's internal organs, making it explode as soon as it is downed. Basically transforms goos into biological suicide bombers.

RecipeDef.label: install bionic motion detector
RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic motion detector. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.label: install bionic buoyancy mechanism
RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic buoyancy mechanism. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.label: install bionic shell
RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic shell. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.label: install bionic wing
RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic wing. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.label: install bionic claw
RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic claw. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.
